name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Shakir BERRYHILL, Appellant

parties:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee
v.
Shakir BERRYHILL, Appellant

opinions.text:
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 10th day of October, 2018, this appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: Karl Baker, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, Keir Nyree Barros-Bradford, Esq., Shonda H. Williams, Esq., for Appellant.
Lawrence Jonathan Goode, Esq., Jonathan Michael Levy, Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney's Office, for Appellee.

COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee

Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
October 10, 2018
Karl Baker, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, Keir Nyree Barros-Bradford, Esq., Shonda H. Williams, Esq., for Appellant.
